title: TINY: IN-GAME: MENUES, CURSOR, CHAMPIONS ON MINI MAP. EVERYTHING. SEND HELP
body:
So I bought a new laptop to play League on the go. A good solid Dell Inspiron 15 7000 series w/ Intel Core i7-6700HQ CPU @2.60GHZ processor, 16GB RAM, and a 64 bit operating system (need to know anything else?)
Everything is beautiful and runs SUPER~ smooth, except when I get in game, my mouse, menues, characters on mini-map, etc are tiny. I often lose track of my mouse in the middle of a fight. This is annoying. I have maxed GUI sizes for in game, But it is still super tiny. 
Send help.

replies.body: Double check the resolution that you're running the game in. If it doesn't match the resolution that your monitor is set to, this can sometimes happen.
